name: Tomcat on a Single VM
description: Tomcat - An Easy starting point for Java web development.

metadata.longDescription: Deploys a single node of Tomcat in VMware for development use, where Tomcat is an open source implementation of the Java Servlet, JavaServer Pages, Java Expression Language and Java WebSocket technologies.

bullets.title: Software deployed
bullets.description: 1. Tomcat: an open source implementation of the Java Servlet, JavaServer Pages, Java Expression Language and Java WebSocket technologies

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• VMware:
    • Flavor:
      • Cores - 1
      • Memory - 1GB
      • Storage - Depends on Image
    • Network:
      • Private IP:
        • Availability - Customer Provided
        • Ingress - Via VPN
        • Egress - Not required
      • Public IP:
        • Availability - None
    • Firewall:
      • Ingress - Allows SSH, and TCP 8080 from all sources
      • Egress - All

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
1. Downloads latest releases of software.
  2. To access the application and virtual machines, please see the instructions in the output log.
  3. More details of software can be found in https://tomcat.apache.org/.
